SplashCautionTitle: Warning: Please read before playing the game.
SplashCautionContent: If you experience symptoms such as dizziness, facial discoloration, eye or facial twitching, foaming at the mouth, confusion or loss of consciousness, or muscle stiffness when exposed to specific light patterns or flashing lights, you may have photosensitive epilepsy. This condition affects a very small percentage of people, including those with epilepsy and some undiagnosed individuals. If you, your family, or other household members have experienced similar symptoms, please consult a doctor before playing the game. If you experience any of the above symptoms during gameplay, please stop playing immediately, seek medical attention as soon as possible, and follow your doctor's advice before continuing to play.
